title: Koena Slams Salman, Varun To Play Param Vir Chakra Recipient Arun Khetarpal & More From Ent
text:
1. Varun Dhawan To Play Arun Khetarpal, 21-Year Old Officer Who Single-Handedly Defeated 7 Pak Tanks in 1971

One of the bravest officers of Indian Army and also the youngest Param Vir Chakra Recipient, Arun Khetarpal’s story will soon be told to the audiences via a biographical movie

2. Bigg Boss 13 Contestant Koena Mitra Lashes Out At Salman Khan For Constantly Supporting Shehnaz Gill

“In the first Weekend Ka Vaar I felt he(Salman Khan) was cold with me and when Siddharth Dey started talking rubbish and then lied about it, thank god that video was aired. I tried to keep my point, where Salman didn’t give me chance to keep my point. Salman didn’t give me a chance to talk. First weekend, I was obviously offended by him, I felt it was one-sided, he should have given me the chance to talk."

3. Still Relevant, Still Hilarious But Naseeruddin Shah Didn’t Find Jaane Bhi Do Yaaro Funny While Shooting It

Don't Miss 1.9 K SHARES 3.9 K SHARES 216 SHARES 405 SHARES

“I never thought it would get completed. I didn’t find it funny while we were making it. I didn’t find anything funny. When I read the script, I did. But while performing, no. That possibly worked for the film because if you find yourself funny the audience is not going to find it funny. You will be laughing at your own joke,” he said during a session at the India Film, as quoted by Indian Express.

4. Ryan Reynolds Hilariously Trolls Hugh Jackman On His Birthday & We Cannot Stop Laughing

After he sings "Happy Birthday,” he trolls him. "I'm not even fucking professionally trained, Jackman. You piece of shit, motherfucker," he jokes.

5. Winner Of Sa Re Ga Ma Pa L'il Champs 2011, Azmat Hussain Says He'd Quit Singing & Started Doing Drugs

When he turned up on the stage, he was recognised by the judge Neha Kakkar. He then made the revelation that he got into bad company and was addicted to drugs. So much so, that he started hating his own voice and gave up singing for three years. But now, he gathered courage to participate in Indian Idol this year.
